name: WordPress Everse Starter Sites – Elementor Templates
author: DeoThemes

sections.description:
DeoThemes | Everse Starter Sites | Docs | Pricing

FREE WEBSITE TEMPLATES FOR ELEMENTOR PAGE BUILDER

Easy to import websites demo content, widgets and customizer settings for Everse theme.

Everse Starter Sites helps you to get professionally looking ready-to-use website with just a few clicks.

This plugin is created only for the Everse theme. You should have the Everse theme installed and activated on your website.

Pick a demo for your niche, click import and you are good to go.

GET A COMPLETE WEBSITE IN JUST 3 STEPS

  1. Install and activate Everse Starter Sites, Everse theme and required plugins
  2. Select a demo for your business
  3. Click import

FULL SITE TEMPLATES FOR

Businesses, restaurants, healthcare medical, apparel stores, construction, fitness, mobile apps, saas, law firms, digital marketing, consulting and many more.

Get more site demos with the extended library of pro templates included in Everse Bundle package.

See list of all available sites to import »

COPYRIGHT

Everse Starter Sites, Copyright 2020 DeoThemes

LICENSE

Everse Starter Sites uses ‘One Click Demo Import’ plugin script
https://github.com/proteusthemes/one-click-demo-import

http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html

Everse Starter Sites uses ‘WordPress Importer’ plugin script
https://github.com/humanmade/WordPress-Importer
(C) 2016 @humanmade
Licensed under the GNU General Public License v2.0,
http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/everse-starter-sites directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Navigate to Appearance -> Everse Starter Sites to preview and import sites.

= UPDATING=
Automatic updates should work like a charm; as always though, ensure you backup your site just in case.
sections.faq:
Does it works with all WordPress themes?

As of now Everse Starter Sites works only with Everse theme.
sections.changelog:
Version 1.2.2
– Updated: Freemius SDK
– Fixed: Replaced deprecated function get_page_by_title with the custom function

Version 1.2.1
– Fixed: Hardened security

Version 1.2
– Added: Yoga starter site

Version 1.1
– Improved: Automatic plugin installation / activation

Version 1.0.8
– Added: Traveling Pro starter site

Version 1.0.7
– Added: Photography Pro starter site

Version 1.0.6
– Added: Digital Agency starter site

Version 1.0.5
– Fixed: Issue with WooCommerce attributes import
– Improved: Elementor default kit assignment

Version 1.0.4
– Added: Medical Supplies Shop starter site

Version 1.0.3
– Fixed: Freemius upgrade bundle code in admin

Version 1.0.2
– Added: Free Wedding Invitation starter site

Version 1.0.1
– Added: Free Furniture Shop WooCommerce starter site

Version 1.0.0
– Initial release

short_description: Ready to use professional website demos designed by UX experts for many business niches. This plugin is created only for the Everse theme.

Click the import button to start the import process.
